snippet: Shares in the Carlyle Group opened flat at $22 on Thursday, a lackluster start to the investment giant’s new life as a publicly traded firm. It closed the day up 5 cents to $22.05 a share.
abstract: Shares in the Carlyle Group opened flat at $22 on Thursday, a lackluster start to the investment giant’s new life as a publicly traded firm. It closed the day up 5 cents to $22.05 a share.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: A Flat Day for Carlyle in Its Debut as a Public Company
headline.print_headline: A Flat Day for Carlyle in Its Debut as a Public Company
